New Records: Nikola Jokic recorded a triple-double with 23 points, 20 rebounds, and 16 assists.
Peyton Watson blocked a shot in the final second to secure the win.
The Nuggets came back from a 16-point deficit in the third quarter.
Key Match Events: Peyton Watson's game-winning blocked shot with 16 seconds left.
The Nuggets' 17-7 run to take control of the game in the fourth quarter.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Thunder allowed 69 points in the second half, their highest in the league this season.
The Nuggets were without Aaron Gordon and Jamal Murray due to injuries.
